actions.name: Ball Fetch

cost.trigger: A creature within Range has a Flung item miss it.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature within Range has a Flung item miss it.

Effect: The user gains +2 ACC and EVA Stages for 2 Activations. Then the user freely moves to the fallen item and picks it up, making it a Held Item.
